_sText:
This is the THIRD release/version of [gg_armf_battlefield]. I will not be posting up the SECOND release/version of [gg_armf_battlefield].

Map Name: gg_armf_battlefield_v3

Changes from v1:
- Side ladders/boxes. (In order to get out (2 ways))
- Boxes on the walkway/bridge.

Changes from v1/v2:
- Changed skybox/environmental lighting. (Which fixed a few mis-lit areas)
- Made the "Diamond/X-shaped" metal borders on bridge and border more realistic. (You can now shoot through them, and they act as "metal". (Which fixed a bug on my VISTA system, which made them generally "spaz/glitch".

*Note: Because of my computer's monitor/brightness settings, the map may appear differently on your monitor than it would on mine, however, because of the changed lighting, the map looks WONDERFUL)

I am very proud of how this map FINALLY turned out. There are no leaks, no errors, and the map looks wonderful.

Again, the map should not lag on your server/LAN. This map has been tested on both low and high quality on my XP desktop, which is under the given requirements to run CS:S, and has been tested on high quality on my Vista laptop.

Constructive criticism and suggestions are welcome!

EDIT: Thanks to TempletonPeck for giving the suggestions on VERSION 1! The map wouldn't have been as nice without the suggestions. Once again, thanks!
